001/*

004 */
005
006package dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.profile.resolver.selection;
007
008import org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair;
009import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
010import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
011
012import java.util.Collections;
013import java.util.List;
014import java.util.Objects;
015import java.util.Set;
016import java.util.regex.Pattern;
017import java.util.stream.Collectors;
018
019import dev.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.model.ProfileMatching;
021import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.model.control.catalog.IControl;
022import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.model.control.profile.IProfileSelectControlById;
023import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.profile.resolver.ProfileResolutionEvaluationException;
024import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
025
026public class DefaultControlSelectionFilter implements IControlSelectionFilter {
027  private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger(DefaultControlSelectionFilter.class);
028
029  @NonNull
030  private final List<Selection> selections;
031
032  /**
033   * Construct a new selection filter based on the provided list of select
034   * criteria.
035   *
036   * @param selections
037   *          a list of select criteria
038   */
039  @SuppressWarnings("null")
040  public DefaultControlSelectionFilter(@NonNull List<? extends IProfileSelectControlById> selections) {
041    this.selections = selections.stream()
042        // ignore null entries
043        .filter(Objects::nonNull)
044        // create a selection object for the selection
045        .map(Selection::new)
046        .collect(Collectors.toUnmodifiableList());
047  }
048
049  @NonNull
050  @Override
051  public Pair<Boolean, Boolean> apply(IControl control) {
052    String id = control.getId();
053    if (id == null) {
054      throw new ProfileResolutionEvaluationException("control is missing an identifier");
055    }
056    return match(id);
057  }
058
059  /**
060   * Checks if the provided control identifier matches the criteria defined by
061   * this object.
062   *
063   * @param id
064   *          the control identifier to match
065   * @return a {@link Pair} whose first member is {@code true} for a match or
066   *         {@code false} otherwise, and whose second member is {@code true} if
067   *         the match applies to any child controls or {@code false} otherwise
068   */
069  @SuppressWarnings("null")
070  @NonNull
071  protected Pair<Boolean, Boolean> match(String id) {
072    return selections.parallelStream()
073        .map(selection -> selection.match(id))
074        // filter out non-matches
075        .filter(Pair::getLeft)
076        // aggregate matches
077        .reduce((first, second) -> {
078          Pair<Boolean, Boolean> result;
079          if (first.getLeft() || second.getLeft()) {
080            // at least one matches
081            boolean withChild = first.getLeft() && first.getRight() || second.getLeft() && second.getRight();
082            result = Pair.of(true, withChild);
083          } else {
084            result = NON_MATCH;
085          }
086          return result;
087        })
088        .orElse(NON_MATCH);
089  }
090
091  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ImplicitSwitchFallThrough")
092  private static Pattern toPattern(@NonNull ProfileMatching matching) {
093    String pattern = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(matching.getPattern());
094    String regex = pattern.chars().boxed().map(ch -> (char) ch.intValue()).map(ch -> {
095
096      String value;
097      switch (ch) {
098      case '*':
099        value = ".*";
100        break;
101      case '?':
102        value = ".";
103        break;
104      case '.':
105      case '+':
106      case '\\':
107      case '[':
108      case ']':
109      case '{':
110      case '}':
111      case '(':
112      case ')':
113      case '^':
114      case '$':
115        value = "\\" + ch;
116        break;
117      default:
118        value = String.valueOf(ch);
119      }
120      return value;
121    }).collect(Collectors.joining("", "^", "$"));
122
123    if (LOGGER.isTraceEnabled()) {
124      LOGGER.atTrace().log("regex: {}", regex);
125    }
126    return Pattern.compile(regex);
127  }
128
129  private static class Selection {
130
131    private final boolean withChildControls;
132    private final Set<String> identifiers;
133    private final List<Pattern> patterns;
134
135    public Selection(IProfileSelectControlById selection) {
136      // process with-child-controls
137      // default is "no"
138      this.withChildControls = "yes".equals(selection.getWithChildControls());
139
140      // process with-ids
141      List<String> ids = selection.getWithIds();
142      if (ids == null) {
143        ids = Collections.emptyList();
144      }
145      this.identifiers = ids.stream()
146          .filter(Objects::nonNull)
147          .collect(Collectors.toUnmodifiableSet());
148
149      // process with-ids
150      List<ProfileMatching> matching = selection.getMatching();
151      if (matching == null) {
152        matching = Collections.emptyList();
153      }
154      this.patterns = matching.stream()
155          .filter(Objects::nonNull)
156          .map(DefaultControlSelectionFilter::toPattern)
157          .collect(Collectors.toUnmodifiableList());
158    }
159
160    public boolean isWithChildControls() {
161      return withChildControls;
162    }
163
164    @NonNull
165    protected Pair<Boolean, Boolean> match(String id) {
166      // first check for direct match
167      boolean result = identifiers.stream().anyMatch(controlIdentifier -> controlIdentifier.equals(id));
168      if (!result) {
169        // next check for pattern match
170        result = patterns.stream().anyMatch(pattern -> pattern.asMatchPredicate().test(id));
171      }
172      return ObjectUtils.notNull(Pair.of(result, isWithChildControls()));
173    }
174  }
175}
